title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 10, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 10, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP reveals his 2020 Super Bowl matchup prediction. We're joined by HOFer Dick Vitale and University of Kentucky Head Basketball Coach John Calipari. Plus, we take a deep dive in Tony Romo's contract as a broadcaster.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
